name: Konohagakure
startIntroPart1: Established by Hashirama Senju and Madara Uchiha after the Warring States Period, Konoha became the first hidden village and model for all others. Its founding birthed the modern ninja system, replacing clan warfare with collective defense.
uniqueText: Its strength lies not in walls or weapons, but in generations of shinobi who turned a dream of peace into reality through sacrifice, forgiveness, and undying hope.
declaringWar: Whenever you live, there will always be war.
defeated: Remember to protect the people that are precious to you.
attacked: To know what is right and choose to ignore it is the act of a coward.
tradeRequest: In the future… I dream of a time when all shinobi will cooperate with each other.

name: Konoha New
uniqueText: The Konoha Root is known for its extensive network of spies, informants, and operatives who gather information and carry out missions that are often too sensitive or dangerous for regular ninja teams.
startIntroPart1: a branch of Konohagakure's Anbu training subdivision. It was disbanded after the death of its founder, Danzō Shimura.
defeated: Hiruzen… it looks like it's my turn next… but I… never did become Hokage
attacked: This world could not function on ideals and pleasantries. It's thanks to people like him that peace has been maintained.
introduction: what do you think of me? What am I to you…?
hateHello: Emotions lead one to hate… and hate leads one to conflict and war
tradeRequest: You cannot compete with just one power. We must master various techniques and use those powers to unite the shinobi world.
